# RDTextureView

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Texture view (used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

## Property Descriptions

<a id="RDTextureView_property_format_override"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[DataFormat](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat) **format_override** = `232` [ðŸ”—](#RDTextureView_property_format_override)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_format_override**\ (\ value\: [DataFormat](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat)\ )
- [DataFormat](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat) **get_format_override**\ (\ )

Optional override for the data format to return sampled values in. The corresponding [RDTextureFormat](RDTextureFormat.md) must have had this added as a shareable format. The default value of [RenderingDevice.DATA_FORMAT_MAX](RenderingDevice.md#RenderingDevice_constant_DATA_FORMAT_MAX) does not override the format.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDTextureView_property_swizzle_a"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TextureSwizzle](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureSwizzle) **swizzle_a** = `6` [ðŸ”—](#RDTextureView_property_swizzle_a)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_swizzle_a**\ (\ value\: [TextureSwizzle](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureSwizzle)\ )
- [TextureSwizzle](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureSwizzle) **get_swizzle_a**\ (\ )

The channel to sample when sampling the alpha channel.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDTextureView_property_swizzle_b"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TextureSwizzle](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureSwizzle) **swizzle_b** = `5` [ðŸ”—](#RDTextureView_property_swizzle_b)

- [TextureSwizzle](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureSwizzle) **get_swizzle_b**\ (\ )

The channel to sample when sampling the blue color channel.

<!-- classref-property -->
